About Me

Hi! I'm Sudarsan Srinivasan, a Mechanical and Product Design Engineer with 3.5+ years of experience in the automotive industry, now pursuing a Master's in Mechanical Engineering at the University of Washington.

I specialize in mechanical design (CAD, DFM/DFA, GD&T, FEA) and integrate cross-disciplinary skills in mechatronics, robotics, and automation to build future-ready systems.

At Bajaj Auto, I led designs across engine systems, structural components, and cost-saving projects. Now, I'm expanding into robotics and control systems through research and hands-on projects.
